script.name: !move.scanpatrol
script.description: Let ship patrol in sector and scanning other ships
script.sourceplaintext:
$dopatrol = [TRUE] $idlecounter = 0 $refuel.counter = 0 $lastScanTime = playing time $lastPlayerTime = $lastPlayerTime - 600 $race = $sector -> get owner race while 1 do if is a new script version available return null if $dopatrol * patrol sector ....................................... if $sector != [ENVIRONMENT] [THIS] ->set command target: $sector @ = [THIS] -> call script !move.movetosector : sector=$sector else $target = null $NotEnemy = [TRUE] $range = [THIS] -> get scanner range $currentTime = playing time if $currentTime < ( $lastScanTime + 300 ) $aThreats = [THIS] ->get current threat ids: type=[Threat.Illegal], min severity=1, range=1, sort severity=[TRUE] if $aThreats $i = size of array $aThreats dec $i = $target = $aThreats[$i] $NotEnemy = [FALSE] end end
if not $target -> exists $rnd = random value from 0 to 100 - 1 if $rnd <= 10
$flags = [Find.Nearest] $target = find ship: sector=$sector class or type=null race=Player flags=$flags refobj=[THIS] maxdist=$range maxnum=null refpos=null
$now = playing time do if $target == [PLAYERSHIP] AND $now <= $lastPlayerTime + 600 $target = null else if $rnd <= 30 $ships = [SECTOR] -> get ship array from sector/ship/station if $ships $table.ships = table alloc $i = size of array $ships while $i dec $i = $s = $ships[$i] if $s ->is race covered $true.owner = $s -> get true owner do if $true.owner != [TRUEOWNER] $table.ships[$s] = [TRUE] end end do if size of table $table.ships $target = get random key: table=$table.ships end end
if not $target $flags = [Find.Enemy] | [Find.Nearest] | [Find.Visible] $target = find ship: sector=$sector class or type=null race=null flags=$flags refobj=[THIS] maxdist=$range maxnum=null refpos=null do if $target $NotEnemy = [FALSE] end
if not $target $flags = [Find.Visible] | [Find.Random] $target = find ship: sector=$sector class or type=Moveable Ship race=null flags=$flags refobj=[THIS] maxdist=$range maxnum=null refpos=null do if $target $NotEnemy = [TRUE] end
skip if $target -> exists goto label doidle
$now = playing time do if $target == [PLAYERSHIP] AND $now <= $lastPlayerTime + 600 goto label doidle
$ships = [THIS] -> get formation follower ships if $ships $index = get index of $target in array $ships offset=-1 + 1 skip if $index < 0 goto label doidle end end
skip if $target -> exists goto label doidle
$target.owner = $target -> get true owner if $target.owner == Player $lastPlayerTime = playing time $target.sector = $target -> get sector end
@ = [THIS] -> call script !move.scanship : Target ship=$target Not Enemy=$NotEnemy if $target.owner == Pirates OR $target.owner == Yaki OR $target.owner == Player $lastScanTime = playing time end end
doidle: $lastScanTime = playing time $time = random value from 200000 to 300000 - 1 if $time mod 2 @ = [THIS] -> move around $time ms else @ = [THIS] -> move to position: x=0 y=0 z=0 with precision 10000 m end
inc $idlecounter = inc $refuel.counter =
if $idlecounter > 10 $dopatrol = [FALSE] $idlecounter = 0 else if $refuel.counter > 70 @ = [THIS] -> call script !move.military.resupply : $refuel.counter = 0 end else gosub FindIlegaleWareandDestroy if [HOMEBASE] $sec = [HOMEBASE] -> get sector if $sec != [SECTOR] $sec = get next sector on route from sector $sector to sector $sec do if $sec $sector = $sec else if [ENVIRONMENT] == [HOMEBASE] gosub FindIlegaleWareandDestroy @ = wait randomly from 150000 to 350000 ms $dopatrol = [TRUE] else @ = [THIS] -> call script !move.returntohomebase : end @ = wait randomly from 100 to 200 ms end end skip if [ENVIRONMENT] == [HOMEBASE] $dopatrol = [TRUE] @ = wait randomly from 100 to 200 ms end return null
FindIlegaleWareandDestroy: $flags = [Find.IllegalWare] | [Find.Multiple] | [Find.Nearest] $awares = find flying ware: sector=[SECTOR] maintype=null subtype=null flags=$flags refobj=$target maxdist=5000 maxnum=20, refpos=null if $awares $size = size of array $awares $i = 0 while $i < $size $ware = $awares[$i] @ = [THIS] -> call script !move.collectware : GALOBJ of flying ware=$ware destroy only=[TRUE] inc $i = end end endsub return null

line.text: is a new script version available
get next sector on route from sector

sval.val: Let ship patrol in sector and scanning other ships
